snippet.title: Nightwing - Batman: Arkham City
snippet.description:
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/batmanarkhamcity

Download the fully playable Nightwing character add-on for Batman: Arkham City. Nightwing comes complete with his own unique gadgets and special moves, and is playable in all challenge maps in the game, as well as two additional challenge maps that are included with the pack: Wayne Manor and Main Hall. The pack also contains a bonus Animated Nightwing character skin.

Nightwing DLC available starting November 1st, 2011.
